Class Repositories

java.lang.Object
persistence.inmemory.Repositories
public class Repositories extends Object
Singleton class that manages multiple repositories used in the application. This class provides access to different repository instances such as AuthenticationRepository, MachineRepository, ItemRepository, IDRepository, and OperationRepository.
